mapper.select: SELECT A.B_NO, A.REF, A.STEP, A.B_LEVEL, A.NAME, A.SUBJ, A.HIT, date_format(A.REGDATE,"%Y-%m-%d") AS REGDATE , @i:=@i+1 AS NUM FROM BOARD A, (SELECT @i:=0 FROM DUAL) B ORDER BY A.REF DESC, A.STEP, A.B_LEVEL
SELECT B_NO, REF, STEP, B_LEVEL, NAME, SUBJ, HIT, date_format(REGDATE,"%Y-%m-%d") AS REGDATE, NEWCONTENTS FROM BOARD WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(REF) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(REF)+1 END AS REF FROM BOARD
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET NAME = #{name}, SUBJ = #{subj}, NEWCONTENTS = #{newcontents}, REGDATE = sysdate() WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
UPDATE BOARD SET STEP = STEP+1 WHERE REF = #{ref} AND STEP > #{step}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN #{step} = 0 THEN MAX(STEP)+1 ELSE #{step}+1 END AS STEP FROM BOARD WHERE REF = #{ref}
